15.eng-name: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah
15.ara-name: كتاب الأحكام عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Salim narrated from his father that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Whoever frees a portion of a slave he owns, then he can afford the remainder of the price, then he should free him with his wealth

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْعَبْدِ يَكُونُ بَيْنَ الرَّجُلَيْنِ فَيُعْتِقُ أَحَدُهُمَا نَصِيبَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Slave Owned By Two Men And One Of Them Frees His Portion Of Him
